thread.title: Watch: Robert Plant Performs 'Kashmir' In Full Without Jimmy Page For First Time Ever [News]
thread.title_full: Watch: Robert Plant Performs 'Kashmir' In Full Without Jimmy Page For First Time Ever [News]

title: Watch: Robert Plant Performs 'Kashmir' In Full Without Jimmy Page For First Time Ever [News]
text:
Posted 12 hours ago 4 
Last night at London's Royal Albert Hall, Robert Plant joined violinist Nigel Kennedy to deliver his first-ever full performance of Led Zeppelin classic " Kashmir " without Jimmy Page on guitar. 
The violinist said (via Blabbermouth ): "Planty is a genuine rock legend and a true musical trailblazer. He's always pushing and challenging himself and immersing himself in music. When we work together it's a combination of power and creativity." You can check out a part of the atmosphere in the clip below.
